section.name: Contributors
section.p: Here's a list of contributors of the SignServer project.

ul.li: Henrik Andréasson, kinneh(at)users.sourceforge.net, Project Manager and Initiator.
Philip Vendil, philip(at)primekey.se, Project Manager, Main developer of the framework.
Lars Silvèn, lars(at)primekey.se, SSL-RMI parts and the possibility to have custom web front end.
Tomas Gustavsson, tomas(at)primekey.se, PDF Signer, PKCS11 sign token, Improved the TSA client with more arguments.
